name: Shopify Customization
shortDescription: Customize your Shopify store to stand out and sell more.
heroDescription: Make your Shopify store uniquely yours. We customize themes, add features, and optimize your store for conversions so you can sell more and stand out from competitors.

deliverables.title: Theme Customization
deliverables.description: Modify your theme to match your brand perfectly

deliverables.title: Custom Features
deliverables.description: Add functionality your theme doesn't have

deliverables.title: Conversion Optimization
deliverables.description: Improve product pages and checkout flow

deliverables.title: Mobile Optimization
deliverables.description: Ensure great shopping experience on phones

deliverables.title: App Integration
deliverables.description: Connect and configure essential Shopify apps

deliverables.title: Speed Optimization
deliverables.description: Make your store load faster for better sales

whoItsFor: Shopify store owners wanting a unique look
E-commerce businesses not happy with their theme
Stores needing custom features or functionality
Anyone wanting to improve their conversion rates

process.title: Review
process.description: We audit your current store and discuss goals

process.title: Plan
process.description: We outline customizations and features needed

process.title: Customize
process.description: We implement changes on a staging environment

process.title: Launch
process.description: We deploy to your live store and test

seo.title: Shopify Customization Services
seo.description: Custom Shopify theme design and development. Make your store unique, fast, and optimized for conversions.
